EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.POL.none.N.G.N.9216.FN POL.Email 06 - Boost productivity, cost savin
EmailTemplate.subject: Boost productivity, cost savings and your career by choosing the right LAN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bring your LAN up to light speed Dare to be different. Dare to boost your organization’s performance. Dare to free up floor space. Dare to reduce OPEX and CAPEX by up to 50%. As a network manager, you can do all this, and more, by choosing Passive Optical LAN. And that’s the sort of decision that can boost your career as well.
Discover how Passive Optical LAN outperforms a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN almost everywhere you look. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
